channel.title: Zombies 3 on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Zombies 3 on Game6r

item.title: Heavy Combat Zombies
item.description: Zombie Attack 3 is an action game in which you have to hold back the attacks of monsters. Aim for the head, you’ll hit for sure. The main thing is to quickly reload weapons, otherwise the monsters will have time to dismantle your house brick by brick, and then they will get to you. Set traps and obstacles, use grenades and explosives to repel the attack.
